segments.text: How long have you been in Taiwan ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: About 3 years , so I came here 2000 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So , where did you grow up ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Providence , Rhode Island . do you know it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am not sure , where exactly is it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , not so far from New York . So what about you ? Did you grow up here ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I was born in Gaoxiong , I only moved to Taipei after I graduated .
segments.speaker: S1
